BKN: Materi Soal Radikalisme Masuk dalam Pelatihan Dasar CPNS
05 Nov 2019, 08:53 by Antara, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Kepala Badan Kepegawaian Negara (BKN) Bima Haria Wibisana mengemukakan bahwa materi mengenai radikalisme kemungkinan akan masuk dalam pelatihan dasar Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil (CPNS) 2019. "Mungkin diakomodasi dalam pelatihan dasar," kata Bima di Jakarta, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Bima mengatakan sejatinya soal-soal atau materi tentang radikalisme akan dimasukkan dalam tes wawasan kebangsaan (TWK). Namun saat ini soal-soal dalam Tes Wawasan Kebangsaan itu sudah sangat terbatas. "Jadi mungkin (dimasukkan) dalam pelatihan dasarnya. Mungkin akan ada tapi sedikit."
Mengenai efektifitas materi radikalisme dalam pelatihan dasar itu untuk mencegah masuknya CPNS berpaham radikal, Bima menilai hal itu akan kurang efektif untuk saat ini. "Kayaknya enggak (efektif). Mungkin di pelatihan dasarnya akan kita cari. Tapi mungkin ke depan (akan lebih efektif), sekarang belum," kata dia.
Menteri Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi Tjahjo Kumolo di Yogyakarta, Senin, 5 November 2019, mengatakan upaya pencegahan radikalisme di dalam perekrutan CPNS akan diakomodasi dalam soal Tes Wawasan Kebangsaan. Namun Tjahjo mengatakan soal-soal mengenai radikalisme dalam Tes Wawasan Kebangsaan kemungkinan masih dalam skala kecil.

BKN: Material About Radicalism Included in CPNS Basic Training
05 Nov 2019, 08:53 by Antara, Endri Kurniawati
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Head of the State Civil Service Agency (BKN) Bima Haria Wibisana said that material on radicalism will likely be included in the basic training of Prospective Civil Servants (CPNS) 2019. "It might be accommodated in basic training," Bima said in Jakarta on Tuesday. November 5, 2019.
Bima said that the questions or material about radicalism would be included in the national insight test (TWK). But now the questions in the National Insight Test are very limited. "So maybe (included) in basic training. Maybe there will be but a little."
Regarding the effectiveness of radicalism material in the basic training to prevent the entry of CPNS with radical ideas, Bima considered that it would be less effective at this time. "It seems that it is not (effective). Maybe in the basic training we will look for it. But maybe in the future (it will be more effective), it is not yet," he said.
Minister of Administrative Reform and Bureaucracy Reform Tjahjo Kumolo in Yogyakarta, Monday, November 5, 2019, said efforts to prevent radicalism in recruiting CPNS would be accommodated in the matter of the National Insight Test. But Tjahjo said the questions about radicalism in the National Insight Test might still be on a small scale.
